summary: The module provides unit tests for the Stable Diffusion XL ControlNet Plug‑and‑Play Attention Guidance (PAG) image‑to‑image pipeline, checking its correctness, deterministic behavior, and compatibility with optional components using a suite of mixins and predefined parameter sets.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of the SDXL ControlNet PAG image‑to‑image generation pipeline to ensure reliable performance for downstream applications and maintain code quality within the diffusion model library.
